mapper.insert: INSERT INTO categorydto(categoryName, cno, categoryLevel) VALUES (#{categoryName}, #{cno}, #{categoryLevel})
mapper.select: SELECT c.cno, p.pno, p.productName, p.productPrice, p.storedFileName FROM categorydto as c INNER JOIN productdto as p ON c.cno = p.cno WHERE p.cno = #{cno};

WITH recursive classifyCategory AS ( SELECT categoryName, cno, categoryLevel, 1 AS level FROM categorydto WHERE categoryLevel IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT ano.categoryName, ano.cno, ano.categoryLevel, 1 + LEVEL AS level FROM categorydto AS ano INNER JOIN classifyCategory ON ano.categoryLevel = classifyCategory.cno ) SELECT categoryName, cno, categoryLevel, level FROM classifyCategory WHERE level = 1
